server

Class ServerSpawnThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.ServerSpawnThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ServerSpawnThread
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    handles the processing of a single client request
    Author:
    Kevin Sun, Luke Newton, Joe Frederick Samuel, Ryan Ribeiro

      • readFile

        public byte[] readFile(java.lang.String filename)
        Reads the contents of the file and stores it as an array of bytes. If the requested file is not found, print error message and send error packet
        Parameters:
        filename - the name of the file to be read
        Returns:
        contents of the file read in

      • sendFile

        public void sendFile(byte[] bytesReadIn)
        Sends the contents of the file, packet by packet, waiting for an acknowledgment to be returned before continuing to the next packet.
        Parameters:
        bytesReadIn - an array of bytes containing the contents of the file to be sent

      • sendPacket

        public void sendPacket()
                throws java.net.UnknownHostException,
                       java.io.IOException
        Wrapper for sendMessage(). Sends a datagram through the server's sendSocket
        Parameters:
        packet - the datagram packet to send
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - indicates and I/O error occurred while sending a message
        java.net.UnknownHostException - thrown if unable to determine the local IP address
